title: Merman Light Skin Tone
description: A mythical male creature with the upper body of a human and the tail of a fish, depicted with a light skin tone. Represents fantasy, the sea, and enchantment.
apple_vendor_description: The merman with a light skin tone on Apple devices is a fantastical character with a shimmering, iridescent tail and a friendly, open expression. Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting bring out the texture of his scales and the subtle curves of his form. This enchanting emoji on Apple devices evokes myths, legends, and the mysteries of the sea, often used to add a touch of magic to conversations.
